name: Crazy Town School Bus Racing
description: Crazy Town School Bus Racing Pro is beautiful 3D racing game for your kids with beautiful graphics. There are 5 different modes for best racing experience. You will have to defeat the AI cars and you can score higher. there are 4 different buses that can be unlocked by wining more races . The best bus to play with is the dobul decker bus, they to unlock it and have fun with it.
